AddonSpecification.LocalizedDescription: LuxTrust ChipGateway activation and protocol Add-On.
AddonSpecification.About: The LuxTrust Chipgateway provides a browser based activation interface and a backend protocol capable of signature creation.

AppPluginSpecification.LocalizedDescription: Endpunkt für die Aktivierung der Open eCard App für das ChipGateway Protokoll.
Endpoint for the activation of the Open eCard App for the ChipGateway protocol.
